plugin.documentation: NodeJS duell library that provides the node executable and an NPM build API for managing npm dependencies.

arg.name: -setup
arg.documentation: Installs node and npm. Mandatory before using any other library feature.

arg.name: -npm
arg.documentation: Runs npm with the arguments placed after. E.g. 'duell run nodejs -npm install electron-prebuilt --save-dev' will npm like 'npm install electron-prebuilt --save-dev'.
